meanings.definition: A unit of currency equal to one thousandth of a franc.
meanings.sent1: I only had a millieme left in my wallet.
meanings.sent2: The price of the item was just a millieme short of what I had.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a millieme millionaire with my tiny amount of money.
meanings.sent4: In the land of cents, a millieme is a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The millieme coin gleamed in the sunlight, catching my eye.

meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one thousandth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: The hair was cut to a millieme precision.
meanings.sent2: The tiny insect moved just a millieme at a time.
meanings.sent3: The millieme measurement was so small, it was almost invisible.
meanings.sent4: In the vast desert, each millieme of distance felt like a mile.
meanings.sent5: The millieme ruler was perfect for measuring tiny objects.
